basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Sid Brown Excellence in Criminal Justice Award

description: Established in honor of Dr. Sidney Brown, Emeritus Professor of Criminal Justice, this scholarship provides an annual award to a selected Criminal Justice student. Eligibility Requirements 3.5 minimum GPA Major in Criminal Justice Undergraduate senior or graduate student Must submit a research paper on a Criminal Justice topic Continuing in the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
